item.title: Minor List
item.description: What is it? Where did it come from? Edited Collections: Adams, Katherine H. & John L. Adams. Eds. Teaching Advanced Composition: Why and How. Portsmouth, Boynton/Cook, 1991. Author Title Pages Adams, Katherine H., and John L. Adams “Advanced Composition: Where Did It Come From? Where is it going?” 3-15 Carter, Michael “What is Advanced about Advanced Composition?: A Theory of Expertise in Writing.
